name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detab - Detach new tabs upon creation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detaches tabs whenever they are created

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically detach tabs upon creation.

You can optionally open new windows in popup mode (hiding all toolbars).

You can also toggle popup mode (i.e. show/hide all toolbars) with Ctrl+Shift+L.

Made with tilling window managers in mind, where tabs can be managed on a window manager level. Chrome tabbing just gets in the way. 

Nice side-effect: system-wide searchable tabs (with something like rofi)
